00008 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00009 
00010 class Density : public QMCalculator
00011 {
00012 public:
00013 
00014     string      Identify() { return "Density"; }
00015     void        Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00016     bool        EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);

00020     vec         _axis;
00021     double      _resolution;
00022     string      _outfile;
00023     string      _outfile_EA_IP;
00024     string      _density_type;

00030 
00031 void Density::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00032 
00033     string key      = "options.density";
00034     _axis           = options->get(key+".axis").as< vec >();
00035     _resolution     = options->get(key+".resolution").as< double >();
00036     _outfile        = options->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00037     _outfile_EA_IP  = options->get(key+".output_e").as< string >();
00038     _density_type   = options->get(key+".density_type").as< string >();
00039 
00040     int autobin     = options->get(key+".auto_bin").as< int >();
00041     _auto_bin       = (autobin == 1) ? true : false;
00042 
00043     if (!_auto_bin) {
00044         _min            = options->get(key+".min").as< double >();
00045         _max            = options->get(key+".max").as< double >();
00046     }
00047     
00048     // Normalize axis
00049     _axis           = _axis / sqrt(_axis*_axis);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 bool Density::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00055 
00056     map< string, vector< double > > map_seg_zs; // for atomistic number density
00057     map< string, vector< double > > map_com_zs; // for segment number density
00058     map< string, vector< Segment* > > map_com_seg;
00059     map< string, bool > set_seg;
00060 
00061     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00062     vector< Atom* > ::iterator ait;
00063 
00064     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00065     // Collect profile positions from atoms in system, order by segment name //
00066     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00067 
00068     double MAX = -1e100;
00069     double MIN =  1e100;
00070     double RES = _resolution;
00071 
00072     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00073          sit < top->Segments().end();
00074          ++sit) {
00075 
00076         Segment *seg = *sit;
00077         if (!set_seg.count(seg->getName())) { set_seg[seg->getName()] = true; }
00078 
00079         double z_com = seg->getPos() * _axis;
00080 
00081         map_com_zs[seg->getName()].push_back(z_com);
00082         map_com_seg[seg->getName()].push_back(seg);
00083 
00084         // Include this segment in density profile?
00085         // if (!wildcmp(seg->getName().c_str(),_seg_pattern.c_str())) {
00086         //     continue;
00087         // }
00088 
00089         for (ait = seg->Atoms().begin();
00090              ait < seg->Atoms().end();
00091              ++ait) {
00092 
00093             double z = (*ait)->getPos() * _axis;
00094 
00095             MAX = (z > MAX) ? z : MAX;
00096             MIN = (z < MIN) ? z : MIN;
00097 
00098             map_seg_zs[seg->getName()].push_back(z);
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (!_auto_bin) {
00103         MAX = _max;
00104         MIN = _min;
00105     }
00106 
00107     int BIN = int( (MAX-MIN)/_resolution + 0.5 ) + 1;
00108     int SEG = set_seg.size();
00109 
00110     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00111     // Calculate density profile from z-list, segment-name based //
00112     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00113 
00114     vector< vector< int > > seg_hist_Ns;
00115     vector< vector< int > > com_hist_Ns;
00116     vector< vector< double > > com_profile_ea;
00117     vector< vector< double > > com_profile_ec;
00118     map< string, bool > ::iterator setit;
00119 
00120     for (setit = set_seg.begin(); setit != set_seg.end(); ++setit) {
00121 
00122         // Retrieve appropriate z list
00123         string segName = setit->first;
00124         vector< double > seg_zs = map_seg_zs[segName];
00125         vector< double > com_zs = map_com_zs[segName];
00126         vector< Segment* > com_seg = map_com_seg[segName];
00127         vector< vector< double > > hist_zs;
00128         vector< vector< double > > hist_zs_com;
00129         vector< vector< double > > binned_ea; // anion site energies  (<> EA)
00130         vector< vector< double > > binned_ec; // cation site energies (<> IP)
00131         hist_zs.resize(BIN);
00132         hist_zs_com.resize(BIN);
00133         binned_ea.resize(BIN);
00134         binned_ec.resize(BIN);
00135         
00136         // Perform binning
00137         vector< double > ::iterator zit;
00138         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00139         for (zit = seg_zs.begin(); zit < seg_zs.end(); ++zit) {
00140 
00141             int bin = int( ((*zit)-MIN)/_resolution + 0.5 );
00142             hist_zs[bin].push_back((*zit));
00143         }
00144 
00145         for (zit = com_zs.begin(), sit = com_seg.begin();
00146              zit < com_zs.end();
00147              ++zit, ++sit) {
00148 
00149             int bin = int( ((*zit)-MIN)/_resolution + 0.5 );
00150             hist_zs_com[bin].push_back((*zit));
00151             binned_ea[bin].push_back((*sit)->getSiteEnergy(-1));
00152             binned_ec[bin].push_back((*sit)->getSiteEnergy(+1));
00153         }
00154 
00155         // Reduce bins
00156         vector< int > hist_Ns;
00157         vector< int > hist_Ns_com;
00158         vector< double > binned_avg_ea;
00159         vector< double > binned_avg_ec;
00160         hist_Ns.resize(BIN);
00161         hist_Ns_com.resize(BIN);
00162         binned_avg_ea.resize(BIN);
00163         binned_avg_ec.resize(BIN);
00164         // Atomistic number density
00165         for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00166             hist_Ns[bin] = hist_zs[bin].size();
00167         }
00168         // Segment-based number density
00169         for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00170             hist_Ns_com[bin] = hist_zs_com[bin].size();
00171         }
00172         // IP and EA
00173         for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00174             double avg_ea = 0.0;
00175             double avg_ec = 0.0;
00176 
00177             for (int entry = 0; entry < binned_ea[bin].size(); ++entry) {
00178                 avg_ea += binned_ea[bin][entry];
00179                 avg_ec += binned_ec[bin][entry];
00180             }
00181             avg_ea /= binned_ea[bin].size();
00182             avg_ec /= binned_ec[bin].size();
00183 
00184             binned_avg_ea[bin] = avg_ea;
00185             binned_avg_ec[bin] = avg_ec;
00186         }
00187         
00188         seg_hist_Ns.push_back(hist_Ns);
00189         com_hist_Ns.push_back(hist_Ns_com);
00190         com_profile_ea.push_back(binned_avg_ea);
00191         com_profile_ec.push_back(binned_avg_ec);
00192     }
00193 
00194 
00195     // +++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00196     // Output number densities //
00197     // +++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00198 
00199     FILE *out;
00200     out = fopen(_outfile.c_str(), "w");
00201 
00202     fprintf(out, "# DENSITY PROFILE ALONG AXIS z = %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00203             _axis.getX(), _axis.getY(), _axis.getZ());
00204     fprintf(out, "# MIN z %4.7f MAX z %4.7f \n", MIN, MAX);
00205 
00206 
00207     fprintf(out, "# z");
00208     for (setit = set_seg.begin(); setit != set_seg.end(); ++setit) {
00209         fprintf(out, " N(%1s,z) ", setit->first.c_str());
00210     }
00211     fprintf(out, " N(z) \n");
00212 
00213     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00214 
00215         double z = MIN + bin*_resolution;
00216         fprintf(out, "%4.7f", z);
00217         int N_z = 0;
00218         if (_density_type == "atoms") {
00219             for (int s = 0; s < SEG; ++s) {
00220                 fprintf(out, " %7d ", seg_hist_Ns[s][bin]);
00221                 N_z += seg_hist_Ns[s][bin];
00222             }
00223         }
00224         else if (_density_type == "segments") {
00225             for (int s = 0; s < SEG; ++s) {
00226                 fprintf(out, " %7d ", com_hist_Ns[s][bin]);
00227                 N_z += com_hist_Ns[s][bin];
00228             }
00229         }
00230         else {
00231             cout << endl << "ERROR: Invalid density type " << _density_type
00232                  << ". Should be either atoms or segments" << flush;
00233             break;
00234         }
00235 
00236         fprintf(out, " %7d \n", N_z);
00237     }
00238 
00239     fclose(out);
00240 
00241 
00242     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00243     // Output spatially-resolved EA, IP //
00244     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00245 
00246     out = fopen(_outfile_EA_IP.c_str(), "w");
00247 
00248     fprintf(out, "# ENERGY LANDSCAPE ALONG AXIS z = %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00249             _axis.getX(), _axis.getY(), _axis.getZ());
00250     fprintf(out, "# MIN z %4.7f MAX z %4.7f \n", MIN, MAX);
00251 
00252     fprintf(out, "# z");
00253     for (setit = set_seg.begin(); setit != set_seg.end(); ++setit) {
00254         fprintf(out, " EA(%1s,z) ", setit->first.c_str());
00255         fprintf(out, " IP(%1s,z) ", setit->first.c_str());
00256     }
00257     fprintf(out, " \n");
00258 
00259     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00260 
00261         double z = MIN + bin*_resolution;
00262         fprintf(out, "%4.7f", z);
00263 
00264         for (int s = 0; s < SEG; ++s) {
00265             fprintf(out, " %4.7f ", com_profile_ea[s][bin]);
00266             fprintf(out, " %4.7f ", com_profile_ec[s][bin]);
00267         }
00268 
00269         fprintf(out, " \n");
00270     }
00271     fclose(out);
00272 
00273     return true;
00274 }
